creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
I found two problems with color-interpolation-filters.
the first is that often handleColorInterpolationFilters is called with
the wrong filter, I'll fix this.

The second is that CSSUtilities.convertColorInterpolationFilter
seems to always return true, even if color-interpolation-filters
is set to srgb.

I looked into the css/svg stuff and I saw a few irregularies with the
c-i-filters registration (like ColorInterpolationFactory always says
it's propery is color-interpolation, ignoring the argument given in it's 
constructor).  Even after fixing these irregularies it continues to 
always return the default value.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 354
My work on this bug so far
